item.title: AaHD8
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: AaHD8 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Artemisia annua Functional Descriptions: Identify a homeodomain-leucine zipper (HD-ZIP) IV transcription factor, AaHD8, directly promoting the expression of AaHD1 for glandular trichome initiation in Artemisia annua.

item.title: ABF2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs3g23480 Gene Symbol: ABF2 Gene Name: Genome: Reference genome of sweet orange Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: A model was proposed to illustrate how ABF2 mediates the ABA signalling involved in sucrose transport, chlorophyll degradation, auxin homoeostasis, carotenoid and ABA biosynthesis, and cell wall metabolism during citrus fruit development.

item.title: VvDELLA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvDELLA1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Spatiotemporal analysis of VvDELLAs showed that both VvDELLA1 and VvDELLA2 are abundant in most tissues, except in developing fruit where VvDELLA2 is uniquely expressed at high levels, suggesting a key role in fruit development.

item.title: VvDELLA2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: VvDELLA2 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Spatiotemporal analysis of VvDELLAs showed that both VvDELLA1 and VvDELLA2 are abundant in most tissues, except in developing fruit where VvDELLA2 is uniquely expressed at high levels, suggesting a key role in fruit development.

item.title: VvDXS
